Ancestral Summer Magic.
Through your peopleâ€™s tradition and passionate spirit, you gain access to spells to influence others. You know one enchantment cantrip of your choice. When you reach 5th level, you learn a 2nd-level enchantment spell of your choice and can cast it once with this trait. At 7th level, you can cast the tongues spell once with this trait. You regain the ability to cast these spells when you finish a long rest. During character creation, you choose whether your spellcasting ability for these spells is Charisma or Intelligence.
You know one cantrip of your choice from the Enchantment school.
